Ummahpreneurs 2025
Applications Received
Projects Selected
Pitched Their Ideas
WINNERS

Ummahpreneurs Mauritius is a dynamic community of entrepreneurs, innovators, and business leaders committed to fostering growth, collaboration, and success. We believe in the power of collective wisdom and shared experiences to transform ideas into thriving businesses.

Through networking events, workshops, mentorship programs, and business competitions, we create opportunities for entrepreneurs to learn, connect, and scale their ventures. Our mission is to build a supportive ecosystem where ambition meets opportunity.
Ummahpreneurs Mauritius was established by three visionary leaders committed to empowering the entrepreneurial ecosystem while upholding Islamic values and sustainable development.
Co-Founder
Founder of Morivert and a recognized figure in ecological initiatives.
Co-Founder
Director of Toloto Rental, an innovative player in the rental sector.
Co-Founder
Founder of Rooftop Gardening, a pioneer of sustainable urban agriculture.
Step-by-step guidance to turn ideas into sustainable businesses through our comprehensive pre-incubation and incubation programs.
Practical workshops on Islamic finance, business, and leadership to equip you with essential entrepreneurial skills.
Connecting youth with entrepreneurs, scholars, and industry leaders to expand your business network and opportunities.
Ensuring all growth remains rooted in Islamic values, upholding halal business as a noble tradition.
Ready to take your entrepreneurial journey to the next level? Join our thriving community today.
